title: Couples App
description: A mobile app for couples to share moments, plan dates, and strengthen relationships
detailedDescription: A comprehensive mobile application for couples. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility, the app integrates Firebase as a back-end service and serves images from an AWS S3 bucket. I've employed local storing, pagination, and memoization techniques to improve load times and enhance offline funcitonality.

title: Astronomy Gallery
description: Web application showcasing astronomical including nebulas, galaxies, and more
detailedDescription: This Astronomy Gallery was built to showcase the images of a specific astrophotographer. The application includes a homepage, about section, and a gallery. I built a hidden admin panel to allow the photographer to upload, edit, or delete images displayed in the gallery. The images are stored in an AWS S3 bucket with their paths and meta-data stored in a Neon DB.
nextSteps: Admin panel drag-and-drop image order re-arrange

title: The Last Descent
description: A short action/adventure game submitted to the 17th Pirate Software game jam
detailedDescription: The Last Descent is an exhilarating action-adventure game created for the 17th Pirate Software game jam. Players navigate through treacherous underground caverns, solving puzzles and battling enemies as they descend deeper into the earth. The game features pixel-perfect art, challenging platforming mechanics, and a compelling narrative about an explorer's journey to reach the world's deepest point. Created in Unity with C# scripting and custom sprites designed in Aseprite.

title: AI Image Translation
description: A system designed to transform artificial surgery practice into a realistic image
detailedDescription: This innovative AI-powered system translates surgical training simulations into photorealistic images, bridging the gap between virtual practice and real-world scenarios. Using advanced PyTorch-based neural networks, the system employs generative adversarial networks (GANs) to convert synthetic medical images into realistic representations. This technology enables medical professionals to train with more lifelike simulations and enhances the effectiveness of surgical education programs.

title: Haunting Grounds
description: A mini stealth/action game created for the 16th Pirate Software game jam
detailedDescription: Haunting Grounds is a stealth-action mini game where players must navigate through haunted environments while avoiding detection by supernatural entities. The game challenges players to use stealth mechanics, environmental awareness, and quick reflexes to survive. Featuring original soundtrack composed in FL Studio, hand-crafted pixel art animations, and tense gameplay that keeps players on the edge of their seats. Developed in Unity with C# for responsive controls and engaging combat systems.

title: Pokédex Application
description: Interactive Pokédex with search functionality and detailed Pokémon information
detailedDescription: A fully interactive web-based Pokédex application that provides comprehensive information about Pokémon from all generations. Features include advanced search and filtering capabilities, detailed stats display, type effectiveness charts, evolution chains, and beautiful card-based layouts. The application uses the PokeAPI for accurate data and implements smooth animations and transitions for an engaging user experience. Built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3 for optimal performance across all devices.
